titleStmt.title: James R. Dupuy to James W. Tate
CWG1516

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Apprehension of Fugitives from Justice Papers, 1862-1863

body.p: Enclosed please find copy of indictment & forfeiture & order for capias of William Ramsey residing in Indiana, twenty five miles from this city -- there are three others pending against him in our court Please send me a requisition on the Gov. of Indiana for him Policemen Charles Orington & Thomas McIlvogue will attend to the arrest

By so doing you will oblige
Yrs truly
J R Dupuy
Comth atty --

Jefferson Co
Indictment
vs
Wm Ramsey
Horse stealing
Requisition on Indiana
Isd Aug 22. 1863
Chas Orington
Agt.
